text: Anumzamofo Kumara fatgo osu veamo'za erisanti oharegahaze hu'nea kea tamagra ontahi'nazafi? Atrenkeno tamagri'a antahintahimo'a tamazeri havia osino! Monko avu'ava'zamo azeri haviama nehia vahe'ma, amema'a omne zante mono'ma hunentea vahe'ma ru vemofo a'nene, aravema hu'nea vemo'o, a'mo'ma atreno ru vene savri nehiane, vene'nemo vene'nene monko'za nehia vahe'mo'zane,
